text: Hi <@U03788W8FFS> i run a dev team in Manchester UK. Happy to jump on a call and discuss how we can support you with this.

Hi all, Raka is looking to hire a full-time web developer with a solid background in WordPress and PHP, strong front-end development skills, as well as HubSpot related development experience. Along with building, maintaining, and optimizing websites on these platforms and helping to build out our code library, you’ll also work with clients to provide support and educate them on processes or specific technologies.

If you’re interested or know anyone who might be, feel free to send me a DM! You can find <https://www.rakacreative.com/careers/web-developer/|more information on our website> as well.

Thanks!
